It seems not change. Is it necessary to delete {} ?

Idea suggests to delete { } for single statement in anonymous functions to simplify code block. The { } from lambda is not as meaningful as those in condition or loop statements. However, I think either is fine in this situation.
Any suggestions for keeping or removing { }?
remove {} and don't put multiple loops on one line, seems easier to read
